abstract: Thailand government formed by military junta after overthrow of Prime Min Yingluck Shinawatra in May 2014 votes to impeach her and impose on her five-year political ban; also announces that she will be charged with criminal negligence for implementing rice subsidy program.
lead_paragraph: Dormant political tensions re-emerged in Thailand on Friday when the military junta’s handpicked assembly impeached the country’s former prime minister, Yingluck Shinawatra.
snippet: Dormant political tensions re-emerged in Thailand on Friday when the military junta’s handpicked assembly impeached the country’s former prime minister, Yingluck Shinawatra.

keywords.value: National Council for Peace and Order (Thailand)
keywords.name: organizations

headline.main: Former Thai Leader Impeached, Reawakening Tensions
headline.print_headline: Former Thai Leader Impeached, Reawakening Tensions
